attributes.action: Suspend any bank holidays during the period of COVID-19 lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: People self-isolating will not be able to enjoy the bank holiday.  Those working need to working to support the country.  Food shops need to remain open during the period of lockdown.
attributes.background: Suspend any bank holidays during the period of COVID-19 to be re-instated later this year, or next.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
